feed.title: Stirling PDF Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.33.1 Docker hub move to stirlingtools/stirling-pdf
entry.content:
We are moving our docker from frooodle/s-pdf to stirlingtools/stirling-pdf and for github image we are doing the same naming change to the full stirling-pdf instead of its shorthand

We are going to be releasing to both places going forward to give migration time with a switch eventually coming Please switch to docker image stirlingtools/stirling-pdf

What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • Fixing bug: Add Image makes random changes to image (#2246) by @thisisrenan in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2256
  • Fix canvas pdf to csv by @DimK10 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2228

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.33.0...v0.33.1

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.34.0 ProductHunt launch and PDF to CSV improvements and more
entry.content:
We have just launched on producthunt!

please consider giving us a upvote and a follow!

This update brings some much needed improvements! - Our PDF to CSV has been heavily upgraded and should see much better results (Thanks to @omar-ahmed42 and tabula-java ) - Multi-tool allows multi-selected drag and drop - Sign allows the same signature to be placed on multiple pages at once - UI cleanups for multi-tool and sign

With this update also comes some breaking changes to our database file for additional security Any users updating from a version older than 0.28.0 will need to first update to a version after that and restart the application. After this the application can be updated to 0.34.0+ as normal This will allow the database to then migrate to the 0.34.0 version

What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • Fix id typo for "cropPdfCanvas" querySelector by @rafael-encinas in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2271
  • Fix: Expand and de-clutter menus for matching search results in homepage #2264 by @omar-ahmed42 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2277
  • Bored waiting button doesnt remove itself after processing (#2079) by @alonsofabila-dev in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2235
  • Fix file clear for errors by @rafael-encinas in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2302
  • Fix: Prevents duplicate listing of search results by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2306
  • Fix: id for submit button added by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2320

Enhancements

  • Multi-tool UI improvements and bug fixes by @reecebrowne in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2288
  • Hover tools tooltips for sign and multi tool by @reecebrowne in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2290
  • multitool multi select (drag drop) move pages by @reecebrowne in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2294
  • Sign multiple PDF pages at the same time in the same location (#2008) by @thisisrenan in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2278
  • Extract tables from PDF to CSV using Tabula by @omar-ahmed42 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2312
  • Add tooltip to sign add to all pages feature by @reecebrowne in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2325
  • Additional sign tooltips by @reecebrowne in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2328

Minor Enhancements

  • shows the titles of the buttons by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2262
  • Read login data from application.properties by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2263
  • Update MetricsAggregatorService.java by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2272
  • Metrics changes by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2273
  • Fix: Fixes dependency bug and replaces obsolete method by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2309
  • Bump com.h2database:h2 from 2.1.214 to 2.3.232 by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2314
  • navbar fix multi tool and compress location by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2331

Docker Updates

  • Bump gradle from 8.7-jdk17 to 8.11-jdk17 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2269

Translation Changes

  • Update German language by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2276
  • Update Arabic language by @omar-ahmed42 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2282
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2289
  • Update translation files by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2298
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2307
  • French translation (again) by @miniupnp in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2315
  • Update Arabic Language for Multi tool section by @omar-ahmed42 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2316
  • Update translation files by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2326
  • Update translation files by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2329
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2334

Other Changes

  • Bump org.projectlombok:lombok from 1.18.34 to 1.18.36 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2266
  • Bump io.micrometer:micrometer-core from 1.13.6 to 1.14.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2253
  • Bump bouncycastleVersion from 1.78.1 to 1.79 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2177
  • Bump org.springframework.security:spring-security-saml2-service-provider from 6.3.4 to 6.4.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2296
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2295
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2310
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2318
  • Bump org.springframework:spring-webmvc from 6.1.14 to 6.2.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2268
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2321

New Contributors

  • @omar-ahmed42 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2277
  • @yusif043-bit made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2287
  • @alonsofabila-dev made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2235

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.33.1...v0.34.0

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.35.0 Multi-tool undo support, replacement of functionality
entry.content:
We have just launched on producthunt few days ago!

please consider giving us a upvote and a follow!

With this release multi-tool now supports undo (ctrl + z) and redo (ctrl + y) special thanks to @omar-ahmed42 for all the great work

Also, with this release, we had to change our OCR tool. This tool lacks some features it previously had; however, it is still using Tesseract, so there are no config changes! We are investigating better tools to use for OCR going forward

What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • (CodeQL) Fixed finding: "Arbitrary file access during archive extraction ("Zip Slip") " by @pixeebot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2344
  • Fix: page break insertion functionality in Multi Tool by @omar-ahmed42 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2350
  • Fix Array.from syntax in nonmultiple file upload by @omar-ahmed42 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2357

Enhancements

  • Feature: Undo Redo options multi tool #2297 by @omar-ahmed42 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2348

Minor Enhancements

  • Fix: input file overwrite in merge by @omar-ahmed42 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2335

Translation Changes

  • Update translation files by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2343
  • Update translation files by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2354
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2355
  • Azerbaijani Language Translation by @NureddinFarzaliyev in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2347

Other Changes

  • Bump commons-io:commons-io from 2.17.0 to 2.18.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2333
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2337
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2342
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2362

New Contributors

  • @NureddinFarzaliyev made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2347

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.34.0...v0.35.0

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: v0.35.1 Bug fixes and file input UI improvements
entry.content:
Some really nice visual updates to our File input menu and lots of other fixes, huge thanks to @omar-ahmed42 for pretty much everything in this update

What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • Fix allowing multiple files to be dropped onto a single file input by @omar-ahmed42 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2359
  • Fix submit button in crop by adding id by @omar-ahmed42 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2374
  • Fix: prevent fileInput.js from adding event listeners more than once by @omar-ahmed42 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2365
  • added support for new line break in stampController by @saikumarjetti in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2370
  • Fix deserialization failure in Change Metadata by @omar-ahmed42 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2382

Enhancements

  • Fix drag and drop area for file choosers by adding separate ones by @omar-ahmed42 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2368

Translation Changes

  • Fix translations for watermark spacers by @omar-ahmed42 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2369
  • Update translation files by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2378
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2380

New Contributors

  • @saikumarjetti made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2370

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.35.0...v0.35.1

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.36.0 PDF New Cert/Signature Validation Feature! and bug fixes
entry.content:
New PDF Certification validation showing validity compared to Mozzila CA or custom-provided cert. Show additional information like expiry time, type and issuer

lots of Bug fixes with file inputs and submit buttons

What's Changed

Enhancements

  • Feature/undo page break by @reecebrowne in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2389
  • PDF Cert validation by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2394
  • Feature: Show permissions as a separate tab by @omar-ahmed42 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2396

Minor Enhancements

  • Fix missing upload button by @omar-ahmed42 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2393
  • Only download one file on sign cert by @reecebrowne in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2397

Translation Changes

  • Update translation files by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2398
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2401

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.35.1...v0.36.0
